Oklahoma freshman Jordan Bowers and fifthyear senior Carly Woodard garnered Big  weekly awards on Tuesday after bounceback victories against No PERIOD  Stanford No PERIOD  Utah State and Arizona in the Sooners third meet of the season PERIOD

For the second time this season jordansbowers and carlyw19 were both honored by the Big12Conference   httpst.cougGyCcEPzK

Bowers was named Big  Newcomer of the Week for the second time this season PERIOD Meanwhile Woodard was named Big  Event Specialist of the Week for the second time this season and the sixth time in her career PERIOD

Bowers earned her third consecutive weekly award after a . performance on vault in last weeks win PERIOD The Lincoln Nebraska native also notched a . on floor a . on bars and a careerhigh . in the allaround PERIOD

Woodard garnered Big  honors following her . on beam and . on floor in the quad meet on Saturday PERIOD Woodard posted a . and . on beam in the last two competitions PERIOD
